titles.title: HP227 Lift up your heads, ye gates of brass

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
A holy war his servants wage,
Mysteriously at strife;
The powers of heaven and hell engage
For more than death or life.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ye armies of the living God,
His sacramental host,
Where hallowed footstep never trod
Take your appointed post.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Though few and small and weak your bands,
Strong in your Captain's strength,
Go to the conquest of all lands:
All must be his at length.

verse.name: v5
v6
